General.Name: Shandong Xinneng Taishan Power Generation Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Shandong Xinneng Taishan Power Generation Co.,Ltd. engages in the industrial park development business primarily in China. The company is involved in the asset operation and bulk commodity supply chain. It engages in the cable business; and provision of leasing and property services. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Nanjing, China.

2.Name: Mr. Zhao Ying  Liu
2.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
